summary: A command‑line training script that fine‑tunes a PixArt ControlNet model for text‑to‑image generation using the HuggingFace Diffusers library and Accelerate. It handles dataset loading, caption tokenization, image preprocessing, collating batches, training loops with optimizers and schedulers, validation image generation, checkpoint saving, and optional publishing to the HuggingFace model hub.
business_intent: Provide researchers and developers with an out‑of‑the‑box solution to adapt PixArt ControlNet to specific visual domains or datasets, enabling customized text‑to‑image generation capabilities and easy sharing of the resulting model.
